Detailed Description

Contains indexpointers to the connections.

FIXME: This class should contain real pointers instead of indices.

RoutingConnection::RoutingConnection (  const RoutingConnection &  other  ) 
 

Creates a deep copy of the RoutingConnection including connectiondata.

Used for storing old connection data after a connectioncost has changed.
